title: The Historical Chronicles of Elinor Sturgeon and the Last Human Colony
description: Earth is long gone! Seventy-two humans have been saved from dying on a lifeless planet by the Par, and now they are expected to fight in an intergalactic war. Does Elinor fight for the Par, the creatures that enslaved her, or does she let the humans die along with everyone else?
author: R.T. Kilgore
